name: Hell's Labyrinths
description:
*WARNING: THIS GAME MAY CAUSE MOTION SICKNESS DUE TO INTENTIONAL CAMERA MOVEMENT*

Controls: 

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

This game was created for the MiniJam: Hell GameJam.

Solo Developed including sound, programming and graphics

The Theme was Hell so I decided to create labyrinths for the 9 rings of hell, unfortunate RL work got in the way and took a lot of my time up so the levels are more  empty than I hoped for.

Not only that but I also made the camera move with the running animation to create a more hellish playthrough further adding to the hell theme.
